title: videos wont load
content: When I try to watch a video on a web page it will not load. To overcome this I have to change to trouble shoot mode and it then plays immediately
creator: barryd1

title: FireFox says downloaded files are malware
content: Hope someone can help please. I’m suddenly getting told since installing 11.4.0.1 when I download files “This file contains a virus or malware”. Yes there is a workaround by saying Allow Download but that shouldn’t have to be the case. By the way my Internet Security confirms all these files are perfectly fine. Thank you.
creator: DW001

title: Can't remember my password for one of my two Firefox accounts
content:
I have two Firefox accounts. My primary account has the toolbar/bookmarks that I usually use. My Mac reset after a software update and I can only recall the password for my older account with a toolbar/bookmarks I have no use for.

How do I recover the account with the toolbar/passwords I need?
creator: charrigan

title: Updated method of disabling private browsing in Ubuntu?
content: Hello, I tried following methods online to disable private browsing however they don't seem to work (possibly due to being outdated?) and I was wondering if there is a way of disable private browsing in Ubuntu 22.04? I have added pictures to show what I implemented and it still allows private browsing.
creator: wilsonhotman

title: NO PUEDO VER SERIESTURCAS.TV Y CON BRAVE ERA PERFECTO
content: Con win7 pro de 32 bits y brave hasta mayo veía perfectos www.seriesturcas.tv. Con win10 32 bits es imposible, por qué? La pc, el sistema, el procesador o utilizo una mala versión de firefox? (102.11ESR)
creator: mariarosamaciel

title: Youtube most of the time has terrible connection speed
content: Lately for the last 3ish days my YouTube connection speed on Firefox and only Firefox has been terribly slow. So slow that it can't even watch normal HD content. But not always, sometimes it does work at normal internet speeds which is so weird. I have around 500 Mbps download speed internet so I know it's not the issue. The picture with the slow download speed is on Firefox and the fast/normal download speed is on Chrome. Sometimes in a private window Firefox runs at normal speed but not always, I don't think it's an extension issue.
creator: Firefox696969

title: What's next firefox-esr version? Cuz I have problem to downgrade profile
content:
I use debian and firefox-esr.

I have problem right now!

I used firefox version 105.0.1 for short times, then firefox transformed my profile to new version profile, so now I can't back to 102-esr version again, I have this message:

`Your Firefox profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible.`

So i try this command to fix problem

firefox-esr -allow-downgrade

or

firefox-esr --allow-downgrade

But still can't downgrade, So I have to ask could I downgrade? else I have to wait for new esr version?

What's the next firefox-esr version? or release date?
creator: a1gard

title: Why can't I use right-click to open in new tab on youtube videos?
content:
I don't understand what happened in the last 10 minutes where both my pc and my laptop can no longer open youtube videos in a new tab by right-clicking. I haven't made any changes, I haven't downloaded anything or installed anything new. The last firefox update for both machines happened yesterday between 1 and 2 in the afternoon. 18 hours after an update, I just lose a basic feature? I'm able to right-click and open youtube vids in edge. So it has to be a firefox thing... Any ideas or suggestions?

I've attached a pic to show you my right-click menu. I've never seen this menu before.
creator: darthno2

title: Reset
content: Can I reset Firefox back to its original download?
